text: Yet they) the disbelievers of Mecca (worship instead of Allah that which can neither benefit them) in this world or in the next, if they worshipped and obeyed them (nor hurt them) in this world or in the next, if they were to disobey them and abstain from their worship. (The disbeliever) Abu Jahl (was ever a partisan) rebellious (against his Lord) it is also that this means: he is always a helper, through his disbelief, to the disbelievers against his Lord.
